definitions.definition: A person who intercedes ; a mediator ; one who reconciles enemies, or pleads for another.

subdefinitions.definition: Especially: a heavenly saint who intercedes (with God) on behalf of a mere mortal.
examples: St Mary the Intercessor ;   St Mary as intercessor

definitions.definition: A bishop who acts during a vacancy in a see .

main_definition: A person who intercedes ; a mediator ; one who reconciles enemies, or pleads for another.
secondary_definitions: A bishop who acts during a vacancy in a see .
